alert.note: Alert for McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 1:50PM CDT until July 17 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South West City, or 12 miles northeast of Jay, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Noel, Dodge, South West City and Cayuga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
